task.title: Step2. Forward Ports for Headquarter PBX
task.shortdesc: If the headquarter PBX is behind a router, you need to forward ports for the headquarter PBX.

p.note: You don't need to forward ports for the branch PBXs.

step.cmd: Log in the router that is connected to the headquarter PBX.

step.info:
Below are the default ports you need to forward:
SIP Registration Port: UDP 5060
RTP Ports: UDP 10000-12000
